title: Le coeur du monde (The Heart of the World)
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George L. Craig, Jr.
provenance_text:
René Magritte [1898-1967], Brussels, Belgium, until January 1959 [1]; Mr. [c. 1898-1984] and Mrs. [1901-1988] George L. Craig, Jr., Sewickley Heights, PA, January 1959 until September 21, 1960 [2]; their gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, September 1960.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 274) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. 
[2]. The painting was purchased from the International by Mrs. George L. Craig, Jr. (Kathleen Casey Craig) for $1,610 (80,000 Belgian francs.) Payment to the artist was sent on January 16, 1959.
